original: Johan Hugo Leonard, bankdirektör, Uddevalla, f. 3)1/12/80 i Hult, Jönköp. 1. G. m. Judith Andersson. Barn: Göran f. 25. — Mog:ex. 02; ex. v. Gbgs handelsinst. 04’. Anst. i Gbgs Handelsbanks tj. sed. 07, varav i Jönköp. 07, som kamrer v. kont. i Uddevalla 16, kont: fö rest. där 33i styr:kd. sed. 34 o. dir. ised. 40. Offentl rev:-uppdrag. Welén, Ernst Mauritz, tandläkare, Lidköping, f. 2(8/5/07 i En köp. av Ferdinand W. lo. Hanna Rydh. G. 34 m. Ingeborg Ek. Barn: Inga-Bell f. 37, Boel 39. — Stud:ex. i Upps. 27, tand-l:kand. 31, tandläkare 35. Praktik- i Lidköp. sed. 33’. , Karl Filip Einar, civilingenjör, Göteborg, f. 22/12/l’l i Maltmö av kamrer Karl Filip Ferdinand W. o. Maria Johansson. G 3Ö m. Margareta Hadding. Barn: Marianne f. 38, Gunnar 41, Arne 45. — Stud:ex. i Lidingö 29, KTH (E) 29-34. Inig:elev v. telegraf v. 314-315, anst. v. AEG i Berlin 3!5-3!6, v. Elektr. A-B AEG sed. 36, varav v. fil. i Sundsvall 36-38, därefter några år v. bolagets avd. f. elektr. industri- o. skeppsutrustn. i Sthlm o. numera tekn. chef f. fil. i Gbg. Relativt omfatt. patentverksamh.
translated:
Johan Hugo Leonard, bank director, Uddevalla, b. 3/1/1880 in Hult, Jönköping. 1st marriage with Judith Andersson. Children: Göran b. 25 --- divorced since 1902; ex. v. Göteborgs handel institute 1904. Employed in Göteborgs Handelsbank since 1907, including in Jönköping from 1907, as a cashier at the branch in Uddevalla since 1916, promoted to manager there in 1933, appointed to the board in 1934 and became a director in 1940. Holds public financial positions. 

Welén, Ernst Mauritz, dentist, Lidköping, b. 28/5/1907 in Enköping to Ferdinand W. and Hanna Rydh. Married in 1934 to Ingeborg Ek. Children: Inga-Bell b. 1937, Boel b. 1939. Studied at Uppsala University, passed dental exams in 1931, became a dentist in 1935. Practiced dentistry in Lidköping since 1933. 

Karl Filip Einar, civil engineer, Göteborg, b. 22/12/1911 in Malmö to accountant Karl Filip Ferdinand W. and Maria Johansson. Married in 1936 to Margareta Hadding. Children: Marianne b. 1938, Gunnar b. 1941, Arne b. 1945. Studied in Lidingö, graduated from KTH (E) in 1934. Apprentice at the telegraph in 1931-1935, employed at AEG in Berlin in 1935-1936, employed at Elektr. A-B AEG since 1936, including at the branch in Sundsvall from 1936-1938, then several years at the company's department for electrical industry and ship equipment in Stockholm, and currently the technical manager for the branch in Göteborg. Engages in a relatively extensive patent activity.
